description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fly your helicopter through a dangerous cavern.  And yes there is an end to the cave...you probably just aren't good enough to get there. Game play couldn't be simpler just press a to fly and let go to drop. Enjoy. Programming and art by Jordan Hample
